7318624417215.name: Rookie Warrior
7318624417215.summary: Heavy armor set for a rookie warrior, for CBBE 3BA, BHUNP, and HIMBO
7318624417215.description:
There are seven modular pieces: the chestplate, the gambeson, pants, poleyns, boots, bracers, and gloves.

For the gambeson and the pants, there are six color variants that you can mix and match. I think black and red looks pretty good.

For 3BA and BHUNP, the gambeson has two versions, one with physics enables and one which does not, the non physics one is for wearing with the chestplate, or if you just enjoy no physics. The boots also come in high heels or regular boots for women.

The chestplate does not jiggle, this is by design.

Requirements:

CBBE 3BA or BHUNPv4 or HIMBO

Bodyslide

Racemenu

esl flagged esp. Use additemmenu, or craft and also temper with steel smithing perk because I found an xedit script that does this for me.

Build with bodyslide first.

7318624419296.name: Sprites
7318624419296.summary: Sprites set for 3BA and BHUNPv4; Elemental sprite/faerie wear in 4 colors.
7318624419296.description:
No, not the lemon-lime soda.

Pieces:

- Bra

- Panty

- Necklace

- Sleeves

- Crown

 - Anklets

- Earrings

- Thighband

All the little silver leaf pieces move with SMP, it was quite a lot of work so I can only hope it's worth it.

esl flagged esp. Use [additemmenu](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17563), [modex](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/137877), or [console](https://elderscrolls.fandom.com/wiki/Console_Commands_(Skyrim)); no crafting recipes. [Build with bodyslide ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=45E8qqnqJDQ)first.

Requirements:

CBBE 3BA or BHUNPv4

Bodyslide

FSMP﻿

Racemenu

Screenshots:

[myst](https://x.com/Myst314)﻿

[url=https://x.com/NuuweiNoir]nuuwei

[/url][thewheel](https://x.com/Thewheel_Skyrim)

7318624419534.name: Forbidden Ebony Armor
7318624419534.summary: Ebony armor set for 3BA, BHUNPv4, and HIMBO
7318624419534.description:
A set of heavy armor, 10 pieces. Bodysuit in rubber or leather, heels or boots, vambraces, rerebraces, pauldrons, leggings, belt, gloves

It was originally a mashup for Oldrim 7B by Stevierage [here](https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/377-sevenbase-conversions-bombshell-and-cleavage-bbp/), I converted it to CBBE 3BA, BHUNP and HIMBO for SSE and replaced the base textures with xavbio's ebony textures, and separated out each piece.

esl flagged esp. Use [additemmenu](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17563), [modex](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/137877), or [console](https://elderscrolls.fandom.com/wiki/Console_Commands_(Skyrim)); crafting recipes require ebony smithing. [Build with bodyslide ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=45E8qqnqJDQ)first.

Requirements:

One of the body mods

Bodyslide

Racemenu

Screenshots:

[sneedster](https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/eternalreminder)

[thewheel](https://x.com/Thewheel_Skyrim)

![Image](https://i.imgur.com/NAEELTf.png)

7318624420449.name: Arianne Follower
7318624420449.description:
It's my 100th mod!

Thanks to [namtar55](https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/namtar55), who really did all of the hard work here, I can share the character I take screenshots with as a follower.

You can find her at the Winking Skeever.

She is a mage. The esp is esl flagged.

CBBE 3BA Bodyslide presets are included, and there is a custom body shape path; there are prebuilt meshes, but you can build the shapes with your own presets, or use something like OBody.

Outfits in screenshots:

[Black Rose](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/142926)

[Crochet Bikini](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/146397)

[Tribal Clothes](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/120203)

[Floral Dress](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/144834)﻿

[Towels](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/145113)

[Invicta Couture Lingerie](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/145126)

7318624418781.name: Crochet Bikini
7318624418781.summary: Crochet Bikini in 18 colors for CBBE 3BA and BHUNP
7318624418781.description:
Two pieces, top and bottom, there's 18 colors.

It sounds like a terrible idea to make a bikini out of yarn, it would feel really disgusting if it ever touches water for a split second.

Requirements:

7318624417510.name: Invicta Couture Lingerie CBBE 3BA
7318624417510.summary: CBBE 3BA bodyslide files for Invicta Couture Lingerie
7318624417510.description:
3ba when? now!

7318624417497.name: Towels
7318624417497.summary: Comfy and soft, 100% Hammerfell cotton towels in 9 colors for CBBE 3BA, BHUNP, HIMBO, and UBE.
7318624417497.description:
Hat towel, shoulder towel, body towel, waist towel.

The shoulder and waist towels have SMP cloth physics.

If the cloth physics doesn't behave well, try increasing the simulation quality in the FSMP configs, if it tanks your fps, buy a 5090. SMP is very finicky with frame rate and sampling rate affecting the simulation outcome. Your mileage may vary, but it works on my setup.

Requirements:

One of the aforementioned body mods

[Bodyslide](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/201)

[Latest FSMP version﻿](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/57339)

esl flagged esp. Use [additemmenu](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17563), [modex](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/137877), or [console](https://elderscrolls.fandom.com/wiki/Console_Commands_(Skyrim)); or you can craft this with 2 tundra cotton and temper with 1. [Build with bodyslide ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=45E8qqnqJDQ)first.

Screenshots:

[myst](https://x.com/Myst314)﻿

[nuuwei](https://x.com/NuuweiNoir)

7318624417359.name: Riley Heels
7318624417359.summary: Heels in 10 colors and a variety of textures for CBBE 3BA, BHUNP, and UBE
7318624417359.description:
stilted

Requires Racemenu for NiOverride high heels, and bodyslide to build the mesh.

If you have [sound record distributor ](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/77815)and heels sounds, this will have heels sounds.

7318624417218.name: Floral Dress
7318624417218.summary: Floral dress and heels with SMP in 8 patterns for CBBE 3BA, BHUNPv4, and HIMBO
7318624417218.description:
A floral dress, I saw this on the daz store and thought it looked just beautiful, so here it is ported to SSE.

If the cloth physics doesn't behave well, try increasing the simulation quality in the FSMP configs, if it tanks your fps, buy a 5090. SMP is very finicky with frame rate and sampling rate affecting the simulation outcome. Your mileage may vary, but it works on my setup.

Requirements:

One of the aforementioned body mods

[Bodyslide](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/201)

[Latest FSMP version﻿](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/57339)

Racemenu

esl flagged esp. Use [additemmenu](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17563), [modex](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/137877), or [console](https://elderscrolls.fandom.com/wiki/Console_Commands_(Skyrim)); [Build with bodyslide ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=45E8qqnqJDQ)first.

  ![Image](https://i.imgur.com/NAEELTf.png)

7318624415310.name: Black Rose
7318624415310.summary: n8k's somewhat unreasonably revealing clothing set. Refreshed for 3BA, BHUNPv4, and HIMBO
7318624415310.description:
My reworked version of the Black Rose set originally by n8k for Oldrim. Previous conversions to SSE have all just coped with the issues with the meshes, which I have tried to address here. Let's say this is Black Rose Refreshed? This is a direct conversion from the [original UNPB mod page ](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46580)from n8k.

Pieces separated out for mix and match enthuiasts. 

The original meshes were fried in terms of polygons and normals (the heels normals were inside out for some reason), so I did some blender work to fix it up and subdivide the pieces so they have more than 20 polygons each, and a lot of small manual mesh edits. They should be less blocky now and generally have less jarring angular shapes. This is not perfect, of course, but it should at least go from 2013 to maybe 2018.

SMP physics has been added to the dangly bits like the rings and the belt ends. On the textures side, the lace textures have been improved, and there are also two new recolors in the usual colors of roses - red and white.

There are hand painted weights for immersive physics, with special thanks to [PsychoWedge](https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/PsychoWedge) for doing the BHUNP weight painting. 

Also, some custom sliders that I will leave as an exercise for the reader to find out what they do.

﻿![Image](https://i.imgur.com/gLNfhTJ.png)﻿

These things all have SMP now, yay!

esl flagged esp. Use [additemmenu](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17563), [modex](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/137877), or [console](https://elderscrolls.fandom.com/wiki/Console_Commands_(Skyrim)); no crafting recipes. [Build with bodyslide ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=45E8qqnqJDQ)first.

Requirements:

CBBE 3BA or BHUNPv4

Bodyslide

FSMP﻿

Racemenu

Optionally, if you have heels sounds and [sound records distributor](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/77815), the heels will have heel footstep sounds.

Screenshots:

[myst](https://x.com/Myst314)﻿

[nuuwei](https://x.com/NuuweiNoir)

[thewheel](https://x.com/Thewheel_Skyrim)﻿

[xkopterx](https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/xtrareelz)

 ![Image](https://i.imgur.com/NAEELTf.png)

![Image](https://files.catbox.moe/cvf8jb.gif)

[one more thing](https://imgur.com/R8QEfSL)

7318624395023.name: Simple Nail Polish - Brighter Colors Patch
7318624395023.summary: Patch for Simple Nail Polish by CallMeMoon to add white and brighter colored nail polish overlay options
7318624395023.description:
This is just a simple texture and script change to add white and brighter colored nail polish options to the [Simple Nail Polish ](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/108077)mod.

The original textures are too dark for lighter and brighter colored Racemenu hues, since the hues act as a tint layer over the texture, so I adjusted the textures to be lighter and saved them to separate files. The script has also been adjusted so now there are light and dark options for each overlay. 

Requires the original mod and all of its requirements.

7318624417128.name: Tris Heels
7318624417128.summary: Heels and socks in 8 colors and a variety of textures for CBBE 3BA, BHUNP, and UBE
7318624417128.description:
more heels here ? 

The heels and the socks can be equipped separately, but the socks are heel shaped, so it's really that you can optionally wear socks with your heels. The other way around doesn't work.

Requires Racemenu for NiOverride high heels, and bodyslide to build the mesh.

If you have [sound record distributor ](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/77815)and heels sounds, this will have heels sounds.

7318624416776.name: Vampire Temptress Armor BHUNP
7318624416776.summary: BHUNP bodyslides for Enovilum's Vampire Temptress Armor set
7318624416776.description:
What is a man? [b]A miserable little pile of secrets[/b].

Requires the [original mod ](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/138179)for textures and esp, some common sense here and there, and SMP.

Thanks to the amazing work of [PsychoWedge](https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/PsychoWedge) there's also options for immersive physics for several pieces - metal plates won't jiggle, and so on.

Step by step guide:

* Download the original mod for assets and esp

* Download SMP if you haven't

* Download the bodyslide files here

* Build bodyslide files

* yay! you did it

Screenshots:

[soggychicken](https://www.twitter.com/SoggyChicken_)﻿

[myst](https://x.com/Myst314)﻿

7318624416777.summary: Heels in 15 colors and a variety of textures for CBBE 3BA, BHUNP, and UBE
7318624416777.description:
heels here ? 

Requires Racemenu for NiOverride high heels, and bodyslide to build the mesh.

If you have [sound record distributor ](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/77815)and heels sounds, this will have heels sounds.

7318624416654.name: Sugar Attack
7318624416654.summary: A shield and mace with five color variants for the high fructose corn syrup pilled adventurer
7318624416654.description:
Sugar spice and everything nice. I guess spice might be pushing it, Kellogg wanted the flakes to be absolutely as bland as possible.

The cereal box just has one texture, but the lollipops come in five flavors. 

How many smacks does it take to get to the center of a tootsie pop? Infinite, because Skyrim does not have durability.

Cereal box is craftable and temperable with steel smithing at a forge with 3 wheat and 5 firewood. Similarly at the forge, you can craft the lollipops with 4 moon sugar and 1 firewood, and temper at a sharpening wheel with 1 additional moon sugar.
